name: Chuck Hulse
introduction: Chuck Hulse (born 3 October 1927 and died 13 July 2020) was an American racing driver who raced in the USAC Championship Car series between 1959 and 1968. During that time, he participated in 7 Indianapolis 500 with a highest finish of 7th in 1967. He tried to qualify for the 1960 Indianapolis 500, which would have counted towards the Formula One championship, but was not successful.
